definitions.definition: An outdoor area containing one or more types of plants , usually plants grown for food or ornamental purposes.

subdefinitions.definition: Such an ornamental place to which the public have access.
examples: You can spend the afternoon walking around the town gardens .

subdefinitions.definition: Taking place in, or used in, such a garden.

definitions.definition: The grounds at the front or back of a house.
examples: This house has a swimming pool, a tent, a swing set and a fountain in the garden .
We were drinking lemonade and playing croquet in the garden .
Our garden is overgrown with weeds.
definitions.label_groups: British , Ireland , Appalachia , New York City

definitions.definition: A road , street , or similar thoroughfare , which sometimes occupies a former garden.
definitions.label_groups: in the plural , used in street names

definitions.definition: Pubic hair or the genitalia it masks.

main_definition: An outdoor area containing one or more types of plants , usually plants grown for food or ornamental purposes.
secondary_definitions: ( British , Ireland , Appalachia , New York City ) The grounds at the front or back of a house.
( in the plural , used in street names ) A road , street , or similar thoroughfare , which sometimes occupies a former garden.
( slang ) Pubic hair or the genitalia it masks.
